name: Baby Tennis Table Tennis
description:
Challenge many IA levels opponents in this table tennis simulation.

Win credits and thus acquire better paddles amongst the 12 available

Baby Tennis Ping Pong is a new way of playing table tennis, totally different from other table tennis games on store: here, the paddle follows the ball, you concentre on where you want to send it and the lift to apply.

The goal is to leave the device away from the ball.

Full 3D, the game is driven by an highly realistic physics engine.
